vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in BANK_SAFE.Collect (0x561eac93c92360949ab1f1403323e6db345cbf31.sol#41-53):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x561eac93c92360949ab1f1403323e6db345cbf31.sol#47-51)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (0x561eac93c92360949ab1f1403323e6db345cbf31.sol#49)
